amendment.description: To provide remedies to members of the Armed Forces discharged or subject to adverse action under the COVID-19 vaccine mandate.

action.text: Amendment SA 421 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 199.

Amendment SA 421 proposed by Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3586-3587) To provide remedies to members of the Armed Forces discharged or subject to adverse action under the COVID-19 vaccine mandate.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 421 proposed by Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 935.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 421 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 199.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 421 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 199.
